DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study describe structure intervention reduce cardiovascular risk clinical setting study effect program lifestyle habit quality life individual risk six month one year .
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Effects Structured Lifestyle Program
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : ( three risk factor ) cardiovascular disease physical inactivity smoking risk consumption alcohol unhealthy food habit stress overweight abdominal obesity high lipid ( cholesterol , LDL ) high blood pressure diabetes/insulin resistance . Exclusion criterion : Not understand Swedish language
